title: Bylines
brief_description: A program that looks inside the Sydney Morning Herald and the staff who put the paper together. “Bylines” takes the audience from the early arrival of the Chief of Staff, through the daily drama of leaks, phone tappings and piracy on the high seas to the convoy of trucks heading into the night with the first edition.
